subject: Bigger Message
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
As I am looking at the messages I am receiving, when I step back, they 
seem to be related (many of them) and of a bigger perspective than just 
some of my small questions.  I know others here have been picking some 
of these messages up about Earth, etc, so I ask, "What do you think?"

I am feeling I need to shut up more and just record what is brought 
forth.  Any others feeling this at all?

LC
